Key Match Events: The Minnesota Twins scored 16 runs over the last two games against the Los Angeles Angels.
The Twins won the series against the Angels, gaining ground in the AL Wild Card standings.
Post-Match Reflections: The Twins' offense waking up in back-to-back wins over the Angels is encouraging.
Minnesota is now just 1.5 games out of the No. 5 seed in the AL Wild Card standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins' series against the Angels was juxtaposed against the Royals' series against the Yankees, which helped Minnesota close the gap on Kansas City.
